lines.text: My name is Jones... Enema Bag Jones.
Know how many assassins it took to kill JFK?
One?
Nope. There were no gunmen at all. His head just did that. I call it the "No Bullet theory."
You're awake?
Yeah, for a while now.
I've been carrying you!
I thought you wanted to.
It's these damn eyes- they're too sensitive to chemicals and... filthy towels.

[Being dragged out the door]
Alright, I'll leave! But I will leave here of my own free will!
What kind of a man has a favorite daughter?
Now, moving along...
And if you do have a favorite then you should label them! Favorite and not favorite!
I feel that I'm a pretty intuitive person. Except for that one guy who said he was an advanced scout for an alien invasion force but it turned out he just wanted to get inside my pants.
I'll never catch him. I quit.
I could kill you right now with just two teabags and some waxpaper!
Captain Hughes, I want to know one thing. Are you sure it was him?
I'm positive. Uh, he wounded a bunch of my guys. He did this somersault thing onto a squad car while shooting.
That's him all right. I've seen him pull himself up into an air duct.
Really?
Well, great, he's out of Cleveland. No longer my problem. Let's go, Jimmy!
The Feds would like you to stay on the case since you've been so involved this far, and the FBI will give you all the backup and resources you need to continue your investigation.
That's just great. What kind of resources.
Unlimited.
Unlimited, huh?
Uh-huh.
Jimmy, how long would it take to get from here to Cincinatti by helicopter?
I don't know. About half an hour.
Great, get one. I got a sister in Cincinatti I haven't seen in eight months. Let's go!
Something happened to me back there with that gun pointed to my head. I had... um... I had a uh...
An epiphany?
No, no. It was more like a realization but on a grand scale...
An epiphany!
No, it had like religious proportions to it...
You're describing an epiphany...
But whatever it was, it made me realize how shallow my life has been...
a million dollars in cash, safe passage across the border...
...And a helicopter.
And a helicopter! Wait!
[to Nelson]
Why?
I always wanted to ride in a helicopter.
Your helicopter is on it's way.
I don't want a helicopter!
Be sure nice to tear this bank down and plant me a fresh crop of corn.
You will not plant one ear of your filthy corn here!
